Headline: Temporary #146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express Reroute at Irving Park/Marine Dr
ShortDescription: 146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted near Irving Park/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Drive/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Inner Lake Shore Drive, West Sheridan, Broadway, Irving Park, Clarendon, Lawrence, Marine Drive, and resume normal route due to street blockage near Irving Park/Marine Dr.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Eastbound #80 Irving Park Reroute near Irving Park/Marine Dr.
ShortDescription: Eastbound 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted near Irving Park/Marine Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, West Sheridan, Broadway, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Irving Park/Marine Dr.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
